thread.title: How to Protect Your ‘Abandoned’ Funds
thread.title_full: How to Protect Your ‘Abandoned’ Funds - WSJ

author: Daisy Maxey
title: How to Protect Your ‘Abandoned’ Funds
text:
Mutual-fund investors are increasingly at risk of seeing their accounts turned over to states as “abandoned” property, the fund industry is warning.
“States have become far more aggressive in claiming property because it puts more money into their coffers,” says Tamara Salmon, an associate general counsel at the Investment Company Institute, a mutual-fund industry trade group. While fund companies and other businesses must follow state laws on when accounts are considered unclaimed property, the trade group is also...
